events.comment: Add some money to the variable mymoney
Remove some money from the variable mymoney

objects.name: Description
objects.string:
Press the button to launch an operation causing lag after selecting intensity.
The operation's performance will be measured and sent to the Firebase console.



                                                       Intensity:

objects.name: SignIn
objects.string:
Hello dear user!
Please log-in to save your progress on the cloud!

objects.name: SurveyText
objects.string:
Hello dear user! Would you mind telling us what you prefer 
with the game so we can improve it? Thank you very much!

objects.name: SurveyText2
objects.string: Good! First of all, could you tell us what level is your favorite?

objects.name: End
objects.string:
Thank you very 
much for your time 
and data user!

events.comment: Store how much the player is annoying
Return to the menu at the end of the survey
If the messages have been updated, or the offset has been changed, update the text in the objects

eventsFunctionsExtensions.author: Arthur Pacaud (arthuro555)
eventsFunctionsExtensions.description: A behavior to position objects using the CSS Flexible Box layout. Find more information at https://css-tricks.com/snippets/css/a-guide-to-flexbox/
eventsFunctionsExtensions.name: FlexBox
eventsFunctionsExtensions.shortDescription: Allows using flexbox for positioning objects

events.comment: Hack: onCreated doesn't has object properties set, use this trigger once to make it like onCreated but after object properties are set.

eventsFunctions.description: Sets the flexbox direction property
eventsFunctions.fullName: Set flex direction
eventsFunctions.name: SetFlexDirection

eventsFunctions.description: Sets the flexbox wrap property
eventsFunctions.fullName: Set flex wrap
eventsFunctions.name: SetFlexWrap

eventsFunctions.description: Sets the alignement method for items on the X axis
eventsFunctions.fullName: Set alignement on the X axis
eventsFunctions.name: SetXAlign
eventsFunctions.sentence: Set flexbox X alignement of items of _PARAM0_ to _PARAM2_

eventsFunctions.description: Sets the alignement method for items on the Y axis
eventsFunctions.fullName: Set alignement on the Y axis
eventsFunctions.name: SetYAlign
eventsFunctions.sentence: Set flexbox Y alignement of items of _PARAM0_ to _PARAM2_

eventsFunctions.description: Sets the alignement method for the lines/rows of objects in the box
eventsFunctions.fullName: Set alignement of the lines
eventsFunctions.name: SetLineAlign
eventsFunctions.sentence: Set flexbox alignement of lines of _PARAM0_ to _PARAM2_

propertyDescriptors.label: The direction of the items (right, left, up or down)
propertyDescriptors.name: Direction

propertyDescriptors.label: Allow adding lines to fit everything inside the Flexbox (nowrap, wrap or wrap-reverse)
propertyDescriptors.name: Wrap

propertyDescriptors.label: The alignement of the items on the X axis (flex-start, flex-end, center, space-between, space-around or space-evenly)
propertyDescriptors.name: JustifyContent

propertyDescriptors.label: The alignement of the items on the Y axis (stretch, flex-start, flex-end or center)
propertyDescriptors.name: AlignItems

propertyDescriptors.label: The alignement of the lines (normal, flex-start, flex-end, center, space-between, space-around, space-evenly or stretch)
propertyDescriptors.name: AlignContent

eventsBasedBehaviors.description: An item in a flex container
eventsBasedBehaviors.name: FlexItem

events.comment: Hack: onCreated doesn't has object properties set, use this trigger once to make it like onCreated but after object properties are set.

eventsFunctions.description: Sets the shrink for this object
eventsFunctions.fullName: Set shrink of the object
eventsFunctions.name: SetShrink

eventsFunctions.description: Sets the growth for this object
eventsFunctions.fullName: Set growth of the object
eventsFunctions.name: SetGrowth

eventsFunctions.description: Sets the order for this object
eventsFunctions.fullName: Set order of the object
eventsFunctions.name: SetOrder

eventsFunctions.description: Sets the alignement method for this object
eventsFunctions.fullName: Set alignement of the object
eventsFunctions.name: SetAlign

propertyDescriptors.label: The order of the object in the container
propertyDescriptors.name: Order

propertyDescriptors.label: Override the alignement for that object (auto, flex-start, flex-end, center, stretch)
propertyDescriptors.name: AlignSelf

eventsFunctionsExtensions.author: @Bouh
eventsFunctionsExtensions.description: Expressions to transform time in seconds to format like HH:MM:SS. Ideal to display timers on screen.
eventsFunctionsExtensions.name: TimeFormatter
eventsFunctionsExtensions.shortDescription: Expressions to transform time in seconds to format like HH:MM:SS. Ideal to display timers on screen.

eventsFunctions.description: Format time in seconds to an ISO string
eventsFunctions.fullName: Format time in seconds to an ISO string
eventsFunctions.name: SecondsToFormattedString

eventsFunctions.description: Format time in seconds to HH:MM:SS
eventsFunctions.fullName: Format time in seconds to HH:MM:SS
eventsFunctions.name: SecondsToHHMMSS

eventsFunctionsExtensions.author: @arthuro555 and @Add00
eventsFunctionsExtensions.name: InputValidation
eventsFunctionsExtensions.shortDescription: Provides conditions to check if a string is a valid phone number, url, email, number, contains only letters. Also provides expressions to manipulate strings (count number of lines, remove new lines, remove non alphanumerical characters).

eventsFunctions.description: Check if the string is a valid phone number.
eventsFunctions.fullName: Check if a string is a valid phone number
eventsFunctions.name: IsValidPhoneNumber

eventsFunctions.description: Check if the string is a valid URL.
eventsFunctions.fullName: Check if a string is a valid URL
eventsFunctions.name: IsValidUrl

eventsFunctions.description: Check if the string is a valid email.
eventsFunctions.fullName: Check if a string is a valid email
eventsFunctions.name: IsValidEmail

eventsFunctions.description: Check if the string represents a number (potentially with a minus sign and potentially with a decimal point).
eventsFunctions.fullName: Check if a string represents a number
eventsFunctions.name: IsValidNumber

eventsFunctions.description: Check if the string has only latin alphabet letters.
eventsFunctions.fullName: Check if a string has only latin alphabet letters
eventsFunctions.name: IsOnlyLetters

eventsFunctions.description: Returns the string without the first line.
eventsFunctions.fullName: Remove the first line
eventsFunctions.name: RemoveFirstLine

parameters.description: String to remove the first line from
parameters.name: text

eventsFunctions.description: Count the number of lines in a string
eventsFunctions.fullName: Count lines
eventsFunctions.name: CountNewLines

parameters.description: The text to count lines from
parameters.name: text

eventsFunctions.description: Replaces every new line character with a space
eventsFunctions.fullName: Replace new lines by a space
eventsFunctions.name: RemoveNewLines

parameters.description: The text to remove new lines from
parameters.name: text

eventsFunctions.description: Remove any non-numerical and non A-Z characters.
eventsFunctions.fullName: Remove any non-numerical and non A-Z characters
eventsFunctions.name: ToAlphanumerical
